text: Gregory Paul Walden (born January 10, 1957) is an American politician. He was the U.S. Representative for from 1999 to 2021. He is a Republican. In October 2019, Walden announced that he would not run for reelection in 2020. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Oregon Category:Businesspeople from Oregon Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Greg Walden
